titleStmt.title: Counsel for the living, occasioned from the dead, or, A discourse on Job III, 17, 18 arising from the deaths of Mr. Fran. Bampfield and Mr. Zach. Ralphson / by Hercules Collins ...
titleStmt.author: Collins, Hercules, d. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Larkin for the author,
